phrases: So you can get used to me.
Are you a bit more used to it?
Then, let us turn it up a notch.
There is so much to it!
And these two have been getting along real well since their pairing fight.
It is the Sametora Flame-Horned Slugger.
Whenever I see it, I remember how brave you were.
You were really cool, too, Senpai!
Are you talking about your battle
against that soldier's ghost during our pilgrimage?
Even though I know it was an illusion...
I cannot look at his face!
It is not the same as before.
Something is even changed between her and Shinomiya!
I am the only one falling behind!
As long as Puri Puri Moon is here...
The moon will never be shrouded in darkness!
My advantage was that I kind of look like Shion from Mirage Saga.
But, since Akane-chan showed up, Shion's been shifted to the hall of fame,
meaning he is out of the picture.
And something definitely happened with all of them during that trip.
We will keep standing up, no matter how many tries it takes.
In other words, never mind having an advantage; I am at a disadvantage.
Listen to the feelings in my heart.
I will be honest about how I feel,
so the most amazing miracle is sure to happen!
An innocent girl's heart is a full moon.
and you can fly all the way to the moon!
I am getting nowhere because I am dancing away my Sunday with my little sister!
How do you want your eggs?
Next break we have, I will get myself a date, no matter what it takes!
Starting tomorrow, I am going all out!
Can you help my circle out?
Beaten to the punch right away!
I am working every day during our next break.
Next month, the Kachu Rabu sales marathon starts.
DVDs, character song albums, voice actor events, Kachu Rabu Cafe, lots of new merch,
a special collab with all convenience stores...
There are even rumors of a new live stage show!
All these new events are around the corner!
And I have used up the six month advance on my allowance for our pilgrimage!
So, for now, I cannot go to any events.
In other words, I have no money.
The truth is, I even got an advance on my New Year's money.
I heard they were hiring lots of part-timers!
I got my first choice job, to work in the Puri Puri Moon show!
I would like to apply for the Puri Moon show.
It is got to be the main character, Puri Puri Moon.
No, that is the title of the show.
You do not watch, do you?
I have just the job for someone bold enough to bluff like you.
Igarashi Yusuke, assigned as an exciting cruise leader!
I am applying for the Puri Moon show!
But, I have to focus on my circle work, so I cannot really come often.
I often go on overseas trips during breaks, too, so it will be hard to find time.
Are you even interested in working?
I have got the perfect kind of shift work for someone like you, though.
Nishina Shima, assigned to the pretty boy butler cafe!
Um, I would like to apply for the Puri Puri Moon special show.
But I am happy working backstage, so
I knew the perfect role for you the moment I saw you!
Shinomiya Hayato, assigned as Princess Usamimi!
I would like to apply for Puri Moon.
I like kids, so I would like to interact with them.
Mutsumi Asuma, assigned to selling balloons as a mascot.
I watch Puri Puri Moon every week with my little sister!
I know all the songs, dances, and signature phrases!
There is no one better suited for the Puri Moon show than me!
As long as Puri Puri Moon's here, the moon will never be shrouded in darkness!
Cannot wait to work with you, Serinuma!
I will definitely get closer to her this way.
You are going to play the role of Dark Prince in the Puri Moon show?!
But, that means I need to go to practice on the weekends and I will not be here.
I will be your coach if there is anything you do not get!
An innocent girl's heart is a full moon every day.
but you need to put your hips into the Ruby pose to get it perfect.
Nana's really done well for himself.
An innocent girl's heart is a full moon,
You know so much about this because of your little sister.
You cannot underestimate it just'because it is a kids' anime.
What fun days we are having.
We get to spend more time together, and there is no one in our
Are you done your training, Igarashi-kun?
We have still got more to do, so go on ahead.
Igarashi always comes after his training is done.
We are meeting tomorrow morning in front of the ticket gate, right?
I am the closest to Serinuma!
I fell asleep last night without drying my hair.
I am going to go now!
Well then, let us have the poses.
Think of this as a real performance.
You fainted from a fever, remember?
The director said to go home and rest.
A staff member gave you a ride home.
You would better eat something before you take any medicine.
You mean in the Puri Moon show?!
B-But that does not mean I am giving you my brother!
You always take care of the house on your own?
When Mommy and Daddy are not around, Onii-chan is here.
But, right now he is busy with the Puri Moon show,
so I told him to put that first!
I am the one who taught him the dance,
so you have to try your best as Ruby, too!
But Onii-chan is going to marry me!
This is the first time I have been into a boy's room.
It is small, is not it?
Besides, that means we can be closer.
Can you get up at all?
Dark Prince was not feeling well, so Ruby took him home.
What the hell are you doing?!
Take your medicine and wake up!
Never mind a step forward, this is a huge step back.
She said she is home with a cold.
She is not answering my calls.
She has not read any of my messages.
I wonder if I will see her at practice tomorrow.
Will the performance will be okay?
We will have to consider a stand-in.
I bet she does not want to see me.
after what I did to her.
If she will not answer, I can just go to her
This is Dark Prince and this is Ruby.
Show it to the girl from the other day.
It is a good luck charm so the show will go well!
Kirari, Nii-chan's going to go out again!
That is not what I meant!
That is not what your body's saying, Senpai.
It is so good when it is in BL!
But, when it happens in reality, it is just scary.
Apparently Nana does not remember a thing because of the fever.
He is not the lying type, so I think that is the truth.
I hope you at least understand that much for now.
Tell him I am not home.
You cannot stay rolling around in bed forever!
I cannot see him just yet!
I am really sorry about what happened.
I know it is not much of an excuse, but I really was not myself!
You do not need to forgive me.
But, Kirari is really looking forward to tomorrow's performance!
So, please, at least go to it!
Why are you yelling in front of our house?!
We do not have a choice.
Um, I know you were acting strange because of your fever,
so do not worry about it.
The front seats are reserved for the little kids.
There are quite a few big kids, too.
You have a problem with that?
Ugh, those guys are at it again.
Those three really have a bad rep.
All right everyone, let us call for Puri Puri Moon as loud as we can!
Oh, it is that kind of show.
Puri Puri Moon Moon Puri Moon Moon!
Puri Puri Moon Moon Puri Moon Moon!
Puri Puri Moon, it seems I have an enemy
I must deal with before facing you.
How about we call a truce for now?
This is not in the script.
Puri Puri Moon and the Dark Prince have formed the Dream Team!
Everyone, let us cheer them on!
Do not get in our way!
How dare you touch my Ruby!
I swear I will never again hurt you.
Now it is time for the group dance.
I think I sprained my ankle in that fall.
I am the only one here today.
It is the group dance you have all been waiting for!
An innocent girl's heart is a full moon.
and you can fly all the way to the moon!
tomorrow we will also be Puri Puri Puri Moon!
Nanashima-kun, I will believe what you said out there.
You were Diamond during the group dance!
I did not have a choice!
Do not say that so earnestly!
I know this really must look so lame, though.
This is why I am falling behind.
Princess Usamimi is a hundred times better than this.
Boys can be scary, but they can also be very dependable!
Serinuma-san, I put everything together for the history club,
but I would like you to draw something.
I am just terrible at drawing.
You seemed like the kind of person who could do anything.
That is not true at all.
When I was little, I could not tell my left from my right.
Oh, and I could not remember how to move each shogi piece.
I am not good at all, though.
December comes in like a tiger!
If you ask me, you are the one
